content: victorian lattice square by destany wymore materials size7/4 5mm hook and ww yarn i used caron simply soft stitches and abbreviations used slip_stitch- slip_stitch chain- chain single_crochet- single_crochet double_crochet- double_crochet space- space decrease- double_crochet 2 together yarn over yo hook insert hook in stitch st pull up a loop 3 loops on hook yo hook pull through 2 loops yo hook insert into st pull up a loop 4 loops on hook yo pull through 2 loops 3 loops on hook yo pull through last 3 loops one decrease made notes at the beginning of some rounds you ll be making a mock double_crochet consisting of a single_crochet plus chain 1 when the pattern says to join with a slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet you will be joining into the chain 1 of the mock double_crochet ©destanywymore page 1 written pattern round 1 make a magic loop or chain 4 join with a slip_stitch in first chain to make a loop in the loop chain 4 counts as double_crochet and chain 1 *double_crochet chain 1* repeat *to* 10 more times join with a slip_stitch in the 3rd chain of the chain 4 pull loop tight 12 double_crochet 12 chain 1 spaces round 2 single_crochet in next chain 1 space chain 1 this single_crochet plus chain 1 counts as a double_crochet double_crochet in same space chain 2 *decrease in the next ch1 space ch2* repeat *to* 10 more times join with a slip_stitch in the 2nd double_crochet 12 decrease 12 chain 2 spaces round 3 single_crochet in next chain 2 space *chain 7 single_crochet in next chain 2 space chain 3 single_crochet in next chain 2 space chain 3 single_crochet in next chain 2 space* repeat *to* 2 more times chain 7 single_crochet in next chain 2 space chain 3 single_crochet in next chain 2 space chain 3 join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet 4 chain 7 spaces 8 chain 3 spaces round 4 single_crochet chain 1 first double_crochet 4 double_crochet chain 3 5 double_crochet in chain 7 loop *single_crochet in next chain 3 loop chain 4 single_crochet in next chain 3 loop 5 double_crochet chain 3 5 double_crochet in chain 7 loop* repeat *to* 2 times single_crochet in next chain 3 loop chain 4 single_crochet in next chain 3 loop join with slip_stitch to top of first double_crochet round 5 single_crochet in next double_crochet ch1 double_crochet in next 3 sts 2 double_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet in next chain 3 space corner made *double_crochet in next 4 sts chain 4 single_crochet in chain 3 loop chain 4 skip next double_crochet double_crochet in next 4 sts 2 double_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet in next chain 3 space* repeat *to* 2 times double_crochet in next 4 sts chain 4 single_crochet in chain 3 loop chain 4 join with slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet round 6 slip_stitch in next double_crochet single_crochet in next double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next 3 sts 2 double_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet in chain 3 space
